includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: Rookie detective James Gordon is assigned to investigate the murder of Thomas and Martha Wayne and meets the only witness, their young son Bruce.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Rookie detective James Gordon is assigned to investigate the murder of Thomas and Martha Wayne and meets the only witness, their young son Bruce.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Rookie detective James Gordon is assigned to investigate the murder of Thomas and Martha Wayne and meets the only witness, their young son Bruce.

includedAssets.title: Selina Kyle
includedAssets.synopsis: Gordon and Bullock investigate when a series of homeless children go missing, including one named Selina Kyle.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Gordon and Bullock investigate when a series of homeless children go missing, including one named Selina Kyle.

includedAssets.title: The Balloonman
includedAssets.synopsis: Gordon and Bullock investigate a vigilante serial killer who straps their victims to weather balloons. Later, Gordon gets a surprise visitor.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Gordon and Bullock investigate a vigilante serial killer who straps their victims to weather balloons. Later, Gordon gets a surprise visitor.

includedAssets.title: Arkham
includedAssets.synopsis: Cobblepot manoeuvres his way into Maroni's good books, who battles Falcone for control of the Arkham area of Gotham.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Cobblepot manoeuvres his way into Maroni's good books, who battles Falcone for control of the Arkham area of Gotham.

includedAssets.title: Viper
includedAssets.synopsis: Gordon and Bullock search Gotham for a dangerous new drug, while Cobblepot establishes himself in Maroni's inner circle.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Gordon and Bullock search Gotham for a dangerous new drug, while Cobblepot establishes himself in Maroni's inner circle.

includedAssets.title: Spirit Of The Goat

includedAssets.synopsis: Gordon and Bullock investigate a serial killer Harvey supposedly took down years earlier.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Gordon and Bullock investigate a serial killer Harvey supposedly took down years earlier.

includedAssets.title: Penguin's Umbrella

includedAssets.title: Harvey Dent
includedAssets.synopsis: Gordon joins forces with young attorney Harvey Dent to find the Waynes' killer, while Selina moves into Wayne Manor.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Gordon joins forces with young attorney Harvey Dent to find the Waynes' killer, while Selina moves into Wayne Manor.

includedAssets.synopsis: Selina and Bruce flee when assassins descend upon Wayne Manor. Gordon hunts for the culprits while Alfred and Harvey search for the kids.

includedAssets.title: What The Little Bird Told Him
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep12 - What The Little Bird Told Him
includedAssets.synopsis: Gordon tries to find an Arkham escapee and get his job back. Falcone battles to hold on to power as Mooney closes in.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Rookie detective James Gordon is partnered with veteran Harvey Bullock to investigate the brutal murder of Thomas and Martha Wayne which had one witness, their young son Bruce. Drama exploring the criminal underworld of Gotham prior to the arrival of the Dark Knight.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Rookie detective James Gordon investigates the murder of Thomas and Martha Wayne. Drama exploring Gotham prior to the arrival of the Dark Knight.
